description: Detects the use of the Microsoft signed script "CL_mutexverifiers" to proxy the execution of additional PowerShell script commands
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
oscd.community
Natalia Shornikova
frack113
name: Potential Script Proxy Execution Via CL_Mutexverifiers.ps1
query: (event.category:process AND process.parent.executable:(/.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.executable:/.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo]\ \-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Tt][Yy][Ll][Ee]\ [Mm][Ii][Nn][Ii][Mm][Ii][Zz][Ee][Dd]\ \-[Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/))
